asin.description: Unique identifier for the Amazon Standard Identification Number.

fnsku.description: Fulfillment Network Stock Keeping Unit for the item.

product_name.description: Name of the product or item.

fulfillment_center.description: Location identifier for the fulfillment center.

country_code.description: Country code where the data is applicable.

longest_side.description: Length of the longest side of the item.

median_side.description: Length of the median side of the item.

shortest_side.description: Length of the shortest side of the item.

measurement_units.description: Units used for measurements (e.g., inches, centimeters).

product_size_tier.description: Tier or category based on the size of the product.

average_quantity_on_hand.description: Average quantity of items available in inventory at hand.

average_quantity_pending_removal.description: Average quantity of items pending removal from inventory.

estimated_total_item_volume.description: Estimated total volume occupied by the item.

month_of_charge.description: Month for which the storage fee is charged.

estimated_monthly_storage_fee.description: Estimated monthly fee for storage of the item.

average_quantity_customer_orders.description: Average quantity of items ordered by customers within the specified timeframe.

base_rate.description: Base rate used for calculating storage fees.

breakdown_incentive_fee_amount.description: Breakdown of incentive fee amount applied for storage.

dangerous_goods_storage_type.description: Type of storage for dangerous goods, if applicable.

eligible_for_inventory_discount.description: Flag indicating if the item is eligible for inventory discount.

qualifies_for_inventory_discount.description: Flag indicating if the item qualifies for inventory discount.

storage_utilization_ratio_units.description: Units used for storage utilization ratio (e.g., percentage).

total_incentive_fee_amount.description: Total amount of incentive fees applied.

utilization_surcharge_rate.description: Rate for utilization surcharge, if applicable.

dataEndTime.description: End time of the data collection period.
